data.title: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Announce Name of Their Baby Boy as They Post New Pic: 'Fam Is Complete'
data.meta_description: The couple welcomed their third son on July 12
data.text:
The couple welcomed their third son on July 12

Peta Murgatroyd and Maksim Chmerkovskiy are introducing their baby boy to the world!

The couple revealed the name of their newborn son on Friday, July 12, as they posted their first close-up snap of their newborn son on Instagram.

‚Äúüíô Milan Maksim Chmerkovskiy üíô,‚Äù Murgatroyd, 37, and Chmerkovskiy, 44, announced in a joint post. ‚ÄúBorn 8.48am „Ä∞Ô∏è 7/12/24 „Ä∞Ô∏è 8 pounds.‚Äù

‚ÄúThe fam is complete,‚Äù the happy parents added.

In the photo, Milan looked peaceful with his eyes closed. The baby boy rested one hand against his head and another on the blanket he was wrapped up in as Murgatroyd cradled him in a hospital bed.

Related: Peta Murgatroyd and Maks Chmerkovskiy Welcome Baby Boy No. 3 in '47 Second' Delivery: 'Exactly One Push'

The name reveal comes after Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy announced the birth of their baby boy earlier in the day on Instagram, sharing a photo of themselves holding him in hospital.

‚ÄúHe is officially evicted from his mom and he is sooooo cute!!!!‚Äù The pair wrote in a joint post. ‚ÄúBirth details later but for now we wanted to let you all know that mom and baby are doing perfect, and delivery took around 47 seconds total! Exactly one push! ‚Ä¶ #madeinPeta #threepeat üèÜüèÜüèÜ.‚Äù

Murgatroyd reshared both posts on her Instagram Stories as she wrote, ‚ÄúHe‚Äôs here üíô,‚Äù over the birth announcement post along with a brightly-colored animated message that read, ‚ÄúWelcome to the world!‚Äù over the close up shot of her son.

Chmerkovskiy also reshared the posts of their baby boy, writing excitedly over the top, ‚ÄúMom and dad of three!!!‚Äù over the first post the couple had shared.

‚ÄúToday was a fantastic day!!!‚Äù he added over the most recent photo of their son. ‚ÄúWelcome to the fam Milan!!!‚Äù

Related: Maksim Chmerkovskiy Excited to Join ‚ÄòSmall Club‚Äô of Dads with 3 Boys Ahead of Son‚Äôs Birth (Exclusive)

Murgatroyd and Chmerkovskiy have been married seven years and already share two sons Shai, 7, and Rio, 12 months.

The couple announced that they were expecting their third child on Instagram in February.

Never miss a story ‚Äî sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up to date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from juicy celebrity news to compelling human interest stories.

Hours before welcoming their son, Chermerkovskiy made a solo appearance at the 2024 ESPY Awards in Los Angeles on Thursday, July 11.

The Dancing with the Stars alum told PEOPLE at the ceremony that he was ready to make a dash from the event as his wife was due to give birth at any minute.

‚ÄúI mean I‚Äôm about to run to see the sign that you have a third child,‚Äù he said.

Luckily, the father of three made it in time to meet his baby boy!
